data.lyric:
[ti:FRIENDS (Explicit)]
[ar:Marshmello/Anne-Marie]
[al:FRIENDS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]FRIENDS (Explicit) - Marshmello (棉花糖)/Anne-Marie
[00:00.13]Written by：Natalie Dunn/Anne-Marie Nicholson/Marshmello
[00:00.27]Oo-oo-oo-oo-oo
[00:02.86]Oo-oo-oo-oo-oo
[00:09.75]
[00:10.37]You say you love me I say you're crazy
[00:12.78]We're nothing more than friends
[00:15.38]You're not my lover more like a brother
[00:17.73]I known you since we were like ten yeah
[00:20.53]Don't mess it up talking that sh*t
[00:22.87]Only gonna push me away that's it
[00:25.20]When you say you love me that make me crazy
[00:28.05]Here we go again
[00:29.93]Don't go look at me with that look in your eye
[00:34.59]You really ain't going away without a fight
[00:39.64]You can't be reasoned with I'm done being polite
[00:44.62]I've told you 1 2 3 4 5 6 thousand times
[00:49.71]Haven't I made it obvious
[00:51.70]
[00:52.24]Haven't I made it clear
[00:53.83]
[00:54.63]Want me to spell it out for you
[00:56.79]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[00:59.15]
[00:59.69]Haven't I made it obvious
[01:02.23]Haven't I made it clear
[01:03.89]
[01:04.60]Want me to spell it out for you
[01:07.01]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[01:09.66]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[01:11.20]Have you got no shame you looking insane
[01:13.38]Turning up at my door
[01:15.26]
[01:15.98]It's 2 in the morning the rain is pouring
[01:18.47]Haven't we been here before
[01:21.06]Don't mess it up talking that sh*t
[01:23.48]Only gonna push me away that's it
[01:26.04]Have you got no shame you looking insane
[01:28.64]Here we go again
[01:30.18]So don't go look at me with that look in your eye
[01:35.22]You really ain't going away without a fight
[01:40.21]You can't be reasoned with I'm done being polite
[01:45.22]I've told you 1 2 3 4 5 6 thousand times
[01:50.37]Haven't I made it obvious
[01:52.17]Haven't I made it
[01:53.02]Haven't I made it clear
[01:54.36]Haven't I made it clear
[01:55.41]Want me to spell it out for you
[01:57.35]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[01:59.82]
[02:00.36]Haven't I made it obvious
[02:02.85]Haven't I made it clear
[02:04.60]
[02:05.52]Want me to spell it out for you
[02:07.76]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:10.28]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:12.27]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:13.95]That's how you f**king spell friends
[02:16.52]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:18.94]Get that sh*t inside your head
[02:21.83]
[02:26.87]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:29.55]We're just friends
[02:30.90]So don't go look at me with that look in your eye
[02:35.78]You really ain't going nowhere without a fight
[02:40.83]You can't be reasoned with I'm done being polite
[02:45.90]I've told you 1 2 3 4 5 6 thousand times
[02:50.95]Haven't I made it obvious
[02:52.40]Have I not made it obvious
[02:53.55]Haven't I made it clear
[02:55.06]I made it very clear
[02:56.00]Want me to spell it out for you
[02:57.92]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[02:59.20]I said F-R-I-E-N-D-S
[03:00.45]
[03:00.97]Haven't I made it obvious
[03:02.48]I made it very obvious
[03:03.68]Haven't I made it clear
[03:05.03]I made it very clear
[03:06.22]Want me to spell it out for you

[03:10.89]F-R-I-E-N-D-S
data.trans:
[ti:FRIENDS (Explicit)]
[ar:Marshmello/Anne-Marie]
[al:FRIENDS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.27]//
[00:02.86]//
[00:09.75]
[00:10.37]你说爱我 我说你疯了
[00:12.78]我们只是朋友
[00:15.38]我不爱你 只把你当做是哥哥
[00:17.73]十岁左右我就认识你了
[00:20.53]不要轻易毁掉我们的关系
[00:22.87]你非要这样 我们只会越来越疏远
[00:25.20]你说你爱我 我说你疯了
[00:28.05]我们可以回到从前那样
[00:29.93]不要用那样的眼神看我
[00:34.59]看来我不绝情一点 你是不会放弃了
[00:39.64]我一直对你保持风度 你却如此死皮赖脸
[00:44.62]我跟你说过无数次了
[00:49.71]难道我表现的还不明显吗
[00:51.70]
[00:52.24]难道我说的还不清楚吗
[00:53.83]
[00:54.63]我要再清楚地告诉你一遍吗
[00:56.79]我们只是朋友！
[00:59.15]
[00:59.69]难道我表现的还不够明显吗
[01:02.23]难道我说的还不清楚吗？
[01:03.89]
[01:04.60]那我再说一次
[01:07.01]朋友！
[01:09.66]我们只是朋友！
[01:11.20]你站在我家门口，一副无耻的样子
[01:13.38]难道不觉得羞愧吗？
[01:15.26]
[01:15.98]现在是凌晨两点，外面下着倾盆大雨
[01:18.47]我们以前从未这样过吗？
[01:21.06]你不要说那些不该说的话 那可能会毁了我们的关系
[01:23.48]那只会把我推得更远
[01:26.04]你现在看起来像疯了一样  难道你一点都不羞愧吗
[01:28.64]我们还像从前一样吧
[01:30.18]不要用那种眼神看我
[01:35.22]看来我不绝情一点 你是不会放弃了
[01:40.21]我一直对你保持风度 你却如此死皮赖脸
[01:45.22]我已经跟你说过无数次了
[01:50.37]难道我表现的还不明显？
[01:52.17]我们不可能
[01:53.02]我说的还不清楚吗？
[01:54.36]我说的还不清楚吗？
[01:55.41]那我再跟你说一次
[01:57.35]我们只是朋友！
[01:59.82]
[02:00.36]我表现的还不明显吗？
[02:02.85]我说的还不清楚吗？
[02:04.60]
[02:05.52]那我再说一次
[02:07.76]朋友！
[02:10.28]朋友！
[02:12.27]我们只是朋友！
[02:13.95]你知道什么叫做朋友吧
[02:16.52]朋友！
[02:18.94]把那些不该有的想法都忘掉！
[02:21.83]
[02:26.87]朋友
[02:29.55]我们就只是朋友！
[02:30.90]不要再用那种眼神看我
[02:35.78]看来我不绝情一点 你是不会放弃了
[02:40.83]我一直对你保持风度 你却如此死皮赖脸
[02:45.90]我已经跟你说过无数次了
[02:50.95]难道我表现的还不明显？
[02:52.40]难道我表现的还不明显？
[02:53.55]我说的还不清楚吗？
[02:55.06]我说的很清楚了！
[02:56.00]再跟你说一次
[02:57.92]朋友！
[02:59.20]我们就只是朋友！
[03:00.45]
[03:00.97]难道我表现的还不明显？
[03:02.48]我表现的够明显了
[03:03.68]我说的还不清楚吗？
[03:05.03]我说的非常清楚
[03:06.22]再说一次
[03:08.23]朋友！
[03:10.89]我们只是朋友！
